name: Pulp Panic
description:
Pulp Panic is a fast-paced and addictive arena shooter set in a world where fruits have come to life and are battling for supremacy in The Great Kitchen Wars. Choose from four playable characters, each with their own unique attributes and weapons, including Orange, Pear, Apple, and Grapefruit. Using your lightning-fast reflexes and powerful arsenal.

 With consistent updates and new content, Pulp Panic never gets old, offering endless hours of addictive gameplay that will keep you coming back for more.
